amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the funding for the Selective Service System ($24.032 million) and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 98 printed in the Congressional Record to eliminate the funding for the Selective Service System ($24.032 million) and to apply the savings to the deficit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 301 (Roll no. 59).
